name: The Local Life
overview:
Our Small Business Marketing Platform provides a complete online marketing solution for small businesses, and gives them a publishing platform for all their local content.

The Local Life Small Business Marketing Platform provides local businesses an all in one solution to their digital marketing needs. Developed from 4 years of in market research, practice and experience, the TLL platform has become an essential marketing tool for small businesses in our cities. Businesses can post to Twitter, maintain their own personal event calendar, post articles and build a blog, as well as email their fans. Through one dashboard, a TLL customer can post an event to the public calendar, add an article about their chefâ€™s favorite recipe, update their menu for the season and then tell all of their followers about their business through Social Media and E-Mail marketing. We didnâ€™t re-invent the wheel, we just put 4 of them together.
